text: Rivky Deython Mokodompit (born in December 5, 1988) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Liga 1 club Persebaya Surabaya as a goalkeeper. ==Honours== ===Club honors=== Sriwijaya * Indonesia Super League: 2011–12 * Indonesian Inter Island Cup: 2012 Mitra Kukar * General Sudirman Cup: 2015 PSM Makassar * Piala Indonesia: 2019 Persebaya Surabaya * East Java Governor Cup: 2020 ==References== ==External links== * Rivky Mokodompit at Liga Indonesia * Rivky Mokodompit at Soccerway Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:People from Kotamobagu Category:Persibom Bolmong players Category:Persita Tangerang players Category:Persitara North Jakarta players Category:Sriwijaya FC players Category:Persisam Putra Samarinda players Category:Mitra Kukar players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Sportspeople from North Sulawesi Category:Indonesian footballers
title: Rivky Mokodompit
